channel.title: admin on Max Lindmark
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Max Lindmark

item.description: Hi! My name is Max Lindmark and I am a PhD Student at the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences. I’m from the west coast of Sweden, and I have a broad interest in marine ecology, ranging from macro ecology to conservation. I have however always been especially interested in fish and fisheries ecology! For my PhD studies, I want to develop mechanistic understanding, based on metabolic scaling principles, on how climate warming affects individuals and how that affects size-structured populations and communities.
